column4: hmmm...interesting concept....load a virtual machine in Windows, and then install Ubuntu in the virtual machine.....
its nowhere near as fast though

my biggest problem is that my wireless doesn't like to play nice with Ubuntu...if I decided to run Ubuntu under Windows, I could, I believe, use the native windows drivers for the wireless, which I would hope would take care of the problem
i'm going to set up a wireless network for my laptop but i don't have $$$ for parts
